summary: WHEN APPLYING BRAKES FRONT END PULSATES WHICH PRODUCES A GRINDING NOISE. DEALER NOTIFIED.   *AK   THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED VIBRATION IN THE FRONT END WHEN BRAKING.  THE VEHICLE HAS NUMEROUS BRAKE ROTOR REPAIRS.  THE CALIPERS LOCKED UP AND THE PISTON SEALS LEAKED.  THE BRAKE LIGHT WAS INOPERATIVE BECAUSE THE CIRCUIT LOST IT'S CONTACT.  THE HORN WAS INOPERATIVE.  THE DEALER REPLACED THE AIR BAG AND REPAIRED THE HORN POWER WIRE FROM THE HORN PAD TO THE HORN CONTACT RING.  *SCC   *NLM
